udc_time.title: Timestamp
udc_time.description: Measure Interval End Timestamp (Military Time format)

udc_ltr_cnt.title: All Counts (LTR)
udc_ltr_cnt.description: All objects passed by from left to right in the last measure inteval

udc_ltr_spd.description: Average speed of all objects passed by from left to right in the last measure inteval

udc_rtl_spd.title: Avg Speed (RTL)
udc_rtl_spd.description: Average speed of objects passed by from right to left in the last measure inteval
